text: Sámuel Major (born 9 January 2002) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Kozármisleny. ==Career== Major started his career with Debreceni VSC. 2017 he went to FC Red Bull Salzburg Academy where he played for the U15, U16 and U18. In 2020 he went on to FC Liefering. In January 2022 he was transfered to the Austrian Bundesliga club FC Admira Wacker Mödling. ==National team== He was part of the Hungarian U-17 team at the 2019 UEFA European Under-17 ChampionshipUEFA Euro u17 squad and 2019 FIFA U-17 World Cup.Fifa u17 world cup squad ==Honours== FC Liefering Runner-up * Austrian Football First League: 2021 FC Red Bull Salzburg Academy * Austrian Youth League U18 Champion: 2019, 2021 ==References== Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Liefering players Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Red Bull Salzburg players
title: Sámuel Major
